Body:
sj = StringJoiner(prefix='[', suffix=']')
sj.add('e1').add('e2').add(3)
sj.add('e0', 0)
self.assertEqual('[e0,e1,e2,3]', str(sj))
expected__repr__ = (
    '{"separator": ",", "prefix": "[", "suffix": "]", "nelem": 4, "str_length": 12, "elements": ["e0", "e1", "e2", "3"]}'
    )
self.assertEqual(expected__repr__, sj.__repr__())
